page.title: 12Hunshelf's "celebrities."
page.content: { MAJOR DEW (OR DE WEND) FENTON} Major Fenton,the major landowner in the area,lived on Hunshelf Bank at one time.Owning a wide area,including Hunshelf,Stocksbridge,Deepcar and Midhope,he seems to have lived in the Snowden Hill-Cloth Farm area,though when is not clear. { BOBBY KNUTT} The actor-comedian,a former "Coronation Street" actor,is said to have lived in the south-west of the area,near Smithy Moor Avenue and Unsliven Bridge. { HANNAH BIRKINSHAW} Not exactly famous,this girl worked in the ill-fated Stocksbridge cotton mill (1794-1804) as a 7-year-old.Her memories have helped local historians pinpoint the mill's closure year.
